com.polarion.alm.tracker.model

Interface IWorkItem

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IAdaptable, IChangeListener, IHasValues, IPObject, IUniqueObject, IWithAttachments<IAttachment>, IWorkflowObject

    public interface IWorkItem
extends IWorkflowObject, IWithAttachments<IAttachment>
    The typed interface for work items.
    Author:
    POLARION SOFTWARE

      boolean traverseLinkedWorkitems(java.util.Set treeLinked, java.util.Set linkTypes, java.util.Set backLinkTypes, IWorkItem.ITerminalCondition condition)
      Traverses (depth first)) the tree of items linked (both back and forward) with this item, adds all touched items to the treeLinked return parameter and terminates either by traversing all of them or on given condition.

        status -

      • getLinkedRevisions

        @NotNull
IPObjectList<IRevision> getLinkedRevisions()
        Returns:
        The immutable collection of IRevision, which are either referenced by this item or which reference this item.

        The resulting collection is union of the results of getLinkedRevisionsDirect() and getLinkedRevisionsDerived().

      • getLinkedRevisionsDirect

        @NotNull
IPObjectList<IRevision> getLinkedRevisionsDirect()
        Returns:
        Immutable collection IRevision linked from this work item. No querying is required. Use addLinkedRevision

      • getLinkedRevisionsDerived

        @NotNull

      • createComment

        @NotNull
IComment createComment(Text text)
        Creates the (temporary) comment object, which can be manipulated by the client. However, the comment is not persisted until it's explicitly saved.

        The fields workItem, project, author, date are pre-filled with the values.

        Parameters:
        text - Text, can not be null.
        Returns:
        the Comment object, with the necessary fields filled in

                                java.util.List visibleTo)

      • addLinkedItem

        boolean addLinkedItem(IWorkItem item,
                      ILinkRoleOpt role,
                      java.lang.String revision,
                      boolean suspect)
        Adds the link. If the link already exists, it will NOT add another one. Links are the same, when target item and link role are equal. Link is also not created when the given item is same as this item.
        Parameters:
        item - target of the link; eventual revision of the object will be ignored
        role -
        revision - null to point to HEAD
        suspect -
        Returns:
        true if link was added.

      • traverseLinkedWorkitems

        boolean traverseLinkedWorkitems(java.util.Set treeLinked,
                                java.util.Set linkTypes,
                                java.util.Set backLinkTypes,
                                IWorkItem.ITerminalCondition condition)
        Traverses (depth first)) the tree of items linked (both back and forward) with this item, adds all touched items to the treeLinked return parameter and terminates either by traversing all of them or on given condition.
        Parameters:
        treeLinked - The set to contain the result. Either a new HashSet() can be passed in, or existing modifiable set with work items to ignore in the traversal. If caller is not interested in this result, then passing a null value will result in the set auto creation.
        linkTypes - String ids of forward link roles for traversal. Passing in null means to traverse all roles.
        backLinkTypes - String ids of backward link roles for traversal. Passing in null means to traverse all roles.
        condition - The termination condition to be evaluated on every item. Can be null, constant false will be used in such a case. Returning true for some work item means, that the traversal will not continue through this item. However, it will terminate just given tree branch, not the complete traversal.
        Returns:
        true if the traversal was stopped by the condition, false if the whole tree was processes.

      • addLinkedOslcResource

                              java.net.URI uri,
                              @NotNull
                              IEnumOption role,
                              @Nullable
                              java.lang.String label,
                              boolean createBackLink)
        Adds the OSLC link. If the link already exists, it will NOT add another one. Links are the same, when the URI and link role are equal. NOT API, WILL BE REMOVED IN THE FUTURE
        Parameters:

        role - the role of the OSLC link.
